quotes.quote: Debugging is like chasing a greased pig around a dark room.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: If you're not failing, you're not innovating enough.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: A good programmer is one who always learns from their mistakes. A great programmer is one who learns from other people's mistakes.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only way to write a bug-free program is to write a program that does nothing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The difference between a programmer and a non-programmer is that a programmer can solve a problem that a non-programmer doesn't even know they have.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Programmers are like ninjas. They sit in the dark and type code that you don't understand.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not a genius. I'm just curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you're not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you've launched too late.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The only way to learn is by doing.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Programming is like sex. One mistake and you have to support it for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Michael Sinz

quotes.quote: The best way to get accurate information on Usenet is to post something wrong and wait for corrections.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Computers are like air conditioners; they only work when you open the windows.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There are two ways to write error-free programs; only the third one works.
quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis

quotes.quote: The best method for accelerating a computer is the one that boosts it by 9.8 m/s^2.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I think Microsoft named .Net so it wouldn't show up in a Unix directory listing.
quotes.author: Oktal

quotes.quote: If builders built buildings the way programmers wrote programs, then the first woodpecker that came along would destroy civilization.
quotes.author: Gerald Weinberg

quotes.quote: The best way to get into heaven is to die while working on a Linux system. That guarantee's you a lifetime of debugging.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of programmers: those who know they don't know anything, and those who don't know they don't know anything.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best way to learn about a programming language is to write a program in it.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: The only way to write bug-free code is to write code that does nothing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only way to test software is to run it. The only way to prove that software works is to use it. The only way to know that software is good is to have people love it.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: Debugging is the process of removing software bugs. Software bugs are just undocumented features.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A programmer is a machine that turns coffee into code.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's not funny.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best way to fix a bug is to remove it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than a bug in your code is a bug that disappears when you try to debug it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only good code is the code that works.
quotes.author: Unknown
